item.title: Trump announces 25% tariff on India plus 'penalty' for trade with Russia
item.description: The 25% tariff rate is modestly lower than what he imposed on India on "Liberation Day," when he announced a 26% rate on the key trading partner.

item.title: Trump says Friday tariff deadline 'will not be extended'
item.description: President Donald Trump then said the U.S. will impose a 25% tariff on goods from India, plus a "penalty" for buying military gear and energy from Russ...

item.title: DOJ urges release of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell grand jury info in new filings
item.description: The Trump administration has faced pressure this month to release information in criminal files related to Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Bessent to American businesses: 'Not the end of the world' if April 2 tariffs kick in
item.description: Top Trump administration officials insist that the Aug. 1 deadline is not changing, even as dozens of countries' trade negotiations are unresolved.

item.title: Trump says Jeffrey Epstein 'stole' Virginia Giuffre from Mar-a-Lago spa
item.description: Virginia Giuffre had said she was sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein after Ghislaine Maxwell spotted her working at Trump's club in Florida.
